title: Session tree architecture (Ralph isolation)
description: Ralph instances pollute Claude session history making /resume cluttered. Design a session tree where Ralph runs in isolated branches that merge results back to main Claude session. When Ralph completes, a summary merges into the parent session without all the iteration noise.
